code:
%% Sequence Diagram – Issue Document with Automated Backup & Opportunistic Cloud Sync
%% Actors: Secretary (Logistics_DeliveryRoute), System services; aligns to Option B schema

sequenceDiagram
	autonumber
	actor Secretary
	participant UI as User Interface
	participant Auth as AuthService
	participant Iss as IssuanceService
	participant PDF as PdfService
	participant FS as FileSystem
	participant Repo as DB/Repository
	participant Bkp as BackupService
	participant Cloud as CloudSyncService

	Secretary->>UI: Login(Logistics_StockLevel)
	UI->>Auth: authenticate(Logistics_FleetManagement)
	Auth-->>UI: auth result
	UI-->>Secretary: login success

	Note over Secretary,UI: Start issuance
	Secretary->>UI: Enter requester details, type, purpose
	UI->>Iss: createIssuance(Logistics_DeliveryRoute)
	Iss->>PDF: generate(Logistics_FleetManagement)
	PDF-->>Iss: PDF bytes/path
	Iss->>FS: save PDF artifact
	FS-->>Iss: path + fileHash
	Iss->>Repo: save IssuanceRecord + Artifact(Logistics_DeliveryRoute)
	Repo-->>Iss: confirm IDs
	Iss-->>UI: issuance created + artifact path
	UI-->>Secretary: show preview/print

	UI->>Bkp: queueLocal(Logistics_StockLevel)
	Bkp->>FS: copy to backup location
	FS-->>Bkp: copy OK
	Bkp->>Repo: record BackupLog(Logistics_FleetManagement)
	Repo-->>Bkp: logged
	Bkp->>Cloud: upload(Logistics_FleetManagement)  
	Note over Cloud: If offline, enqueue and retry when online
	Cloud-->>Bkp: result (Logistics_DeliveryRoute)
	Bkp->>Repo: update BackupLog + Artifact.syncStatus
	Repo-->>Bkp: updated
	Bkp-->>UI: backup status / alerts
	UI-->>Secretary: notify backup/cloud status

	Note over Secretary,Cloud: End of issuance flow

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 用户在这里会遇到 Logistics_DeliveryRoute 和 Logistics_StockLevel 的分支。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'Logistics_DeliveryRoute 和 Logistics_StockLevel'？
嗯，这样看起来很清晰。

对的，就这样。

对的，就这样。

extra.repo_description: A transaction‑centric records and document issuance system for Barangay Santol (Silang, Cavite), designed for reliability on limited hardware, with automated local backup and opportunistic cloud sync
